entries.text: they always have a suspiciously specific example
their Venmo history is a cry for help
screenshots exist and they know it
they said 'no context' and posted it anyway
we've all seen the Notes app apology draft
they keep using 'allegedly' like a comma
their Finsta is more active than their main
the group chat receipts never lie
they've already rehearsed the excuse
last time ended with a 'we need to talk'
they brought a slideshow to prove otherwise
they followed it up with 'but hear me out'
three sources confirmed and one was them
they archived the story five minutes later
their 'friend' did the exact same thing
they said 'long story short' and it wasn't
they start every sentence with 'technically'
we found the notes from their debate practice
their search history is a legal gray area
they already asked for 'amnesty' before playing
they say 'no screenshots' and then send one
they bring a lawyer voice to petty arguments
they keep a folder called 'Context' on their phone
the 'close friends' list is just damage control
they preface jokes with 'this stays here'
they edit messages three times before sending
the apology drafts have bullet points
they've muted half the group and we know why
their notes app has an alibi section
last week ended with 'no further questions'
their Uber rating tells a story
they said 'respectfully' and meant the opposite
they posted 'no context' with all the context
their camera roll has a 'receipts' album
their 'friend of a friend' keeps leaking details
they say 'to be fair' before self‑incrimination
their keyboard autocorrects to 'allegedly'
everyone already made the meme
they're one screenshot away from a TED Talk
they labeled a folder 'oops' on desktop
everyone remembers the group trip incident
they preface stories with 'off the record'
there was a second apology after the apology
they reply 'context?' whenever tagged
they keep their read receipts on
their BeReal timing was… suspicious
someone already made a spreadsheet about it
they said 'I can explain' and couldn't
the witness list is just mutuals
they used 'per my last text' irl
their close friends story vanished fast
the group chat title changed that night
they brought a whiteboard to brunch
their camera roll search hits 'evidence'
they start with 'wild if true'
they muted notifications 'for focus' again
they're already drafting the statement
they said 'hypothetically' and made it real
someone yelled 'receipts?' and three appeared
their phone auto-suggests 'in my defense'
the apology had sections and subheaders
they keep saying 'allegedly' mid-story
the group chat went silent for minutes
